resources.string: Purpose of this application is to combines a calculator, tip calculator, and note keeper/expense tracker in one convenient application and you do not need to open three different applications for different tasks, you can write your expenses in this application only after calculating them
It has functionality of a basic calculator, which you can use for daily routine calculations.

It has functionality of a basic Tip calculator, the tip value ranges from 0 to 40% of the base bill amount and based on the tip percent it shows about the quality of the food and service. It shows you the tip amount and total amount including bill.

It allows you to make notes of essential things like you can write about any upcoming even, task, or write related to your expenses how much you have spend at what place on which date and many more things you can save in it. It will be not deleted until you delete that by yourself or uninstall the app.
The application enhances efficiency by integrating a calculator, tip calculator, and note keeper into one platform, eliminating the need to switch between different apps.
The application offers convenience by providing easy-to-use tools for everyday tasks such as calculations, tip computations for restaurant bills, and note-taking.
